full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
* EQ7552-231266 - Inspection of Boilers, Pressure Vessels, Piping Systems, and Associated Safety Devices
* EQ7552-231266 - Inspection de Chaudières, Appareils et Tuyauteries sous Pression et Dispositifs de Sécurité Connexes

#### Tender Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the inspection of boilers, pressure vessels, piping systems, and associated safety devices across various locations in Ontario, with the exception of the National Capital Region.

#### Tender Details
* Reference Number: WS3824288518-Doc3893167900
* Solicitation Number: WS3824288518
* Publication Date: 2023-02-27
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-03-22T14:00:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-03-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-06-30

#### Eligibility and Scope
Eligible bidders are invited to submit a proposal that outlines their methods and procedures for inspecting boilers, pressure vessels, and associated safety devices. The tender is open to bidders who can provide a comprehensive range of services, including installation, maintenance, repair, and operation of the aforementioned equipment.

#### Trade Agreements
The tender incorporates several trade agreements, including the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and several other bilateral and multilateral trade agreements.

#### Contact Information
For further information and tender documents, please visit the following URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15540397?extsite=MTU1NDAzOTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15540397?extsite=MTU1NDAzOTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

The contact person for this tender is Stanley Chui, who can be reached at [stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
